flawed_nl_solution:
If in five years, Hania will be 45 years old, currently she is 45-5 = <<45-5=36>>36 years old.
Ten years ago, Hania was 36-10 = <<36-10=26>>26 years old.
Samir just turned half the age Hania was 10 years ago, which means she is 26/2 = <<26/2=13.0>>13.0 years old.
In five years, Samir will be 13.0+5 = <<13.0+5=18.0>>18.0 years old

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 40, not 36. This appears to be a minor miscalculation.
